title: Frontend updates for expanded killers, bosses, and admin pet quick-picks

requirements.summary: Update Killers page progression text, total unlocked count, and unlock-availability logic for 13 total killers through Zeus.
acceptanceCriteria: Killers page shows the full progression order ending with Zeus.
The unlocked badge/count shows `X / 13 Unlocked` (4 existing + 9 new).
The "Unlock Next" card/button remains available until 13 killers are unlocked, and is not shown once all 13 are unlocked.

file_operations.description: Update the displayed unlock order text to include all killers through Zeus in the correct order; update the unlocked counter total to 13; update `canUnlockNext` to allow unlocking until 13 killers are unlocked (and hide the unlock card once 13 are unlocked).

requirements.summary: Add 7 new boss presets to the Gameplay Combat Arena so the Bosses tab shows 12 selectable boss fights within the allowed reward range.
acceptanceCriteria: The Combat Arena "Bosses" tab renders 12 boss cards.
Each boss card displays its Gold/EXP rewards without layout breakage.
All boss `goldReward` values are between 5,000 and 500,000 inclusive.

file_operations.description: Expand `BOSS_PRESETS` by adding 7 additional distinct bosses (unique names and stats) so there are 12 total boss presets; ensure each new boss uses `goldReward` within 5,000–500,000 inclusive and continues to render correctly in the Bosses tab cards.

requirements.summary: Add 5 pet-name quick-pick options to the Admin Panel pet creation UI without removing manual typing.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Panel → Pets tab includes an easy way (e.g., select/dropdown) to choose any of the 5 pet names and populate the Pet Name input.
Choosing a quick-pick pet name does not prevent manual editing/typing in the Pet Name input.
The existing Add Pet flow still submits via the existing `useAddPet` mutation and succeeds when a quick-pick name is used.

file_operations.description: In the Pets tab, add a quick-pick control (e.g., a dropdown using the existing Select UI) with options: Floof, Buddy, Void breaker, Neo, Beluga; selecting an option sets `petName` while keeping the Pet Name input editable; keep the existing `useAddPet` submission flow unchanged.
